description: Luganodes Restaked ETH will help secure and facilitate networks in the Symbiotic Ecosystem. Luganodes is a leading Swiss-operated Institutional-Grade blockchain infrastructure provider, managing over $3 Billion in staked assets across 45+ networks. We run ~7%(second largest) of the Natively Restaked Ethereum on bare metal infrastructure with 99.99% uptime.
name: Luganodes Restaked ETH
